Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory99.png'}
{3: 'Southwood Road...'}
{3: 'Less than a thousand kilometers from Kowloong Metropolis.'}
{3: 'It was a scantily populated seaside area even back in its heyday, nothing compared to the major East Asian cities.'}
{3: 'What interest could the President have in this place?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pilot', 3: '"Cabin, this is Mother Swan-2. We are approaching Southwood Road FOB (forward operating base) temporary runway."', 4: '1'}
{3: "...Looks like it's not the time to read through files."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory1.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct', 3: 'Babylonia Support Force, codename "Abyss E3714". Identify yourself.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Identify yourself', 3: '18'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: 'Verifying... Verification successful. Babylonia Task Force, 【kuroname】, Mission E-A-3317.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: 'Mission briefing commences in: 33 minutes, 14 seconds. Location: Tent 4.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After the conversation—obviously a template—the service Construct stalks off.'}
{3: '...Eh, saved me a lot of trouble.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory4.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Task Force', 3: 'The briefing will begin now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Task Force', 3: 'I am the leader of task force "Dodo"—don\'t ask about the name. None of your concern.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Task Force', 3: "I'm just here to hand over the details and access to Mission E-A-3317 to you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Task Force', 3: 'All right, enough chitchat.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Task Force', 3: 'Next, I will be going over the mission details and handing over the base supplies and command authority of the Support Force.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You can read about the situation at Southwood Road in the file. If I have to describe it... due to certain necessities of the post-pandemic generation, the place is not exactly abandoned.'}
{2: 'Task Force', 3: "Didn't even read the file, huh?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Task Force', 3: "This section was shared by two major East Asian cities—that is to say, before the pandemic, it was pretty much no man's land.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Task Force', 3: 'When the pandemic happened, the two major cities exiled the incurable humans and possibly infected mechanoids to this area.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Task Force', 3: 'As you know, "humane treatment" is usually reserved only for humans.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Task Force', 3: 'Still, what they called "humane treatment" was simply to offer the incurable humans rations and ammunition enough to last them four lifetimes.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Task Force', 3: 'Back then, "Arcadia" had priority over everything.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Task Force', 3: "...Anyway, let's not waste time talking about this. Let's move on to the transfer process—", 4: '1'}
{3: '[Verification successful. Mission Commander: 【kuroname】]'}
{2: 'Task Force', 3: 'My mission is done here. I suggest that you find an excuse to get rid of this ticking time bomb as soon as you can.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Task Force', 3: 'Nothing good will come out of it, trust me.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'An hour after I landed and finished with the procedures, the Gray Raven transportation craft arrives and lands, following the laser guidance signals.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Commandant! I bet you've added me to the team because there's something Lucia can't handle alone, haven't you?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Move to the side, Karenina. You're in the way of the Support Force.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Technically speaking, it's true that there's something I can't handle, but the main reason is—", 4: '3'}
{2: '—Sophia was on vacation.', 3: '53', 4: "—Karen's in the Engineering Force.", 5: '53'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...That's right.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Tch, whatever... truth is that Lucia can't do it on her own!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Can we... chat after we've reached the target?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory19.jpg'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'What fresh hell is this?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Countless tents and mud stoves surround the gigantic, battered manmade structure.'}
{3: 'However, the supposed inhabitants of these tents are nowhere in sight.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'No need to investigate. I show no heat signals from the tents.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What about anti-infrared outfits?', 3: '79'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Even if they wore those, there would still be movement detectable to ten-thousandth of an inch. There's nothing.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Therefore, there are no humans in the tents—at least not live ones.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Liv, air and soil analysis, please.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: '...No human organic elements have been detected in either the soil or the air.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'According to the files, over a thousand scavengers from cities including 015, 049, 063 and more live here.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Scanning the large structure surrounded by the tents.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Multiple—no—a swarm of Corrupted signals detected.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What about humans?', 3: '93'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "As I'm a specialized prototype customized by Star of Life, my Inver-Device is slightly better at detecting life signs.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Liv immediately syncs the marked location on her holo-map to her terminal.'}
{2: "Let's move out.", 3: '100'}
